channel.title: Philosophy on Rob's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Philosophy on Rob's Notes

item.title: Homo Deus - Is Man's reach exceeding his grasp?
item.description: “In pursuit of health, happiness and power, humans will gradually change first one of their features and then another, and another, until they will no longer be human.

item.title: The Great Mental Models: Volume 2
item.description: “Combining a deep specialized knowledge in a domain with a broader understanding of the rules that govern the physical world is a rare combination that saves you time, money, and problems.

item.title: The Great Mental Models: Volume 1
item.description: “The quality of your thinking depends on the models that are in your head.” ~ The Great Mental Models, Volume 1: General Thinking Concepts1 by Shane Parrish & Rhiannon Beaubien
